channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for LA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for LA

item.title: Report X-2023121082
item.description:
Report X-2023121082

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-21
  • City: Livonia
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNION PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: I got notified by the FRA inspector that this car had several DOT defects. I inspected the car and found there was product in between the ball of the liquid valve and the plug and the plug was less than tool tight. I vented the car and let the material drain back into the car. I wiped down the spillage and properly secured the car.
